nodes.text: Spin-and-Win machines were a type of gambling device. During 5 ABY, they could be found in the Holiday Towers casino in Cloud City on Bespin. After Zorba Desilijic Tiure, the casino's owner at the time, escaped the Sarlacc of Tatooine, he promised one hundred slightly used Spin-and-Win machines to a group of Jawas in exchange for a ride to the Mos Eisley spaceport.
